input_args.passage: "David Wells' perfect game | On May 17, 1998, David Wells of the New York Yankees pitched the 15th perfect game in Major League Baseball history and the second in team history.\n25 Years Ago, David Wells Was Miraculously Perfect | It is one of the best stories from a storybook 1998 Yankees season, when David Wells through a perfect game despite imperfect circumstances."
input_args.claim: 'The sources tell us that David Wells, a player for the New York Yankees, pitched a perfect game in 1998.'
